socialCard.resume1: Hey there! ðŸ‘‹ I'm Nima, a web developer who loves building awesome websites!
socialCard.resume2: I work with Django for the backend and Vue.js for the frontend combining them to create smooth, dynamic web experiences.

backend.title: Back-end
backend.text: Leveraging the Django framework and modern software development standards, I build robust, secure, and scalable backend systems. The primary focus is on developing architectures that support both technical and business needs in the long term.

api.title: API
api.text: I design and implement REST and GraphQL APIs with an emphasis on simplicity, security, and clear documentation. These interfaces are crafted for seamless frontend integration and long-term scalability, with precise third-party service integration when required.

ui.title: UI/UX Design
ui.text: Using professional tools like Figma, I design interfaces grounded in user experience principles, real user needs, and modern design standards. The goal is to deliver an intuitive, brand-aligned experience that is both visually appealing and functionally effective.

frontend.title: Front-end
frontend.text: I develop interactive, responsive frontends using Vue.js and Nuxt.js, ensuring fast load times, clean code structure, and smooth user experiences. Attention to detail, purposeful animations, and high performance across devices are at the core of every implementation.
